Sentencas: The efficient conversion of solid carbon fuels into energy by reducing the emission of harmful gases is important for clean environment.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: In this regards, direct carbon fuel cell (DCFC) is a system that converts solid carbon directly into electrical energy with high thermodynamic efficiency (100%), system efficiency of 80% and half emission of gases compared to conventional coal power plants.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: This can generate electricity from any carbonaceous fuel such as charcoal, carbon black, carbon fiber, graphite, lignite, bituminous coal and waste materials.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, ternary carbonate-samarium doped ceria (LNK-SDC) electrolyte has been synthesized via co-precipitation technique, while LiNi-CuZnFeO (LNCZFO) electrode has been prepared using solid state reaction method.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: Due to significant ionic conductivity of electrolyte LNK-SDC, it is used in DCFC.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: Three types of solid carbon (lignite, bituminous, sub-bituminous) are used as fuel to generate power.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction confirmed the cubic crystalline structure of samarium doped ceria, whereas XRD pattern of LNCZFO showed its composite structure.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The proximate and ultimate coal analysis showed that fuel (carbon) with higher carbon content and lower ash content was promising fuel for DCFC.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The measured ionic conductivity of LNK-SDC is 0.0998 Scm(-1) and electronic conductivity of LNCZFO is 10.1 Scm(-1)
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell
Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: A maximum power density of 58 mWcm(-2) is obtained using sub bituminous fuel.
Titulo: Electrochemical study of composite materials for coal-based direct carbon fuel cell
